metadata.synopsis: After the party, this companion is still trying to come down from all the energy, and with a good enough bond it is possible for the player avatar to flirt and unlock a romance option.
metadata.how_to_trigger: loadlevel WLD_Main_Aoe readyattackonden (allow for flag to set)oe attackondenvictory (allow for flag to set)SetGlobalOsirisFlag DEN_AttackOnDen_Event_TieflingPartyInvitationctrl+7 > karlach > recruit > as companionlong rest

8.speaker: Karlach
8.text: Would you look at this place? All these people - happy because of us.

94.speaker: Karlach
94.text: It's nice to be somewhere where good is still possible.

39.speaker: Karlach
39.text: With you - and just lately, I feel like I can remember what it's like to be... good.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: I can imagine there weren't a lot of chances for do-goodery in Avernus.

31.speaker: Karlach
31.text: I tried, in the beginning. Blew up in my face spectacularly. Lesson learned, never try to befriend a devil, cambion, or imp.

1.speaker: Karlach
1.text: Orthons are good for a drink and joke, but you can't turn your back on 'em.

19.speaker: Karlach
19.text: But hey - enough about that. That's history now. I want to think about the future.

51.speaker: Karlach
51.text: The one nice thing about being trapped in the inexorable grind of time is you've always got something to look forward to.

106.speaker: Player
106.text: That's true. And I'm looking forward to spending more time with you.

139.speaker: Karlach
139.text: Me too. I don't think I've ever looked forward to anything as much.

134.speaker: Player
134.text: I want to be close to you. Now, ten minutes from now, ten years from now.

109.speaker: Karlach
109.text: Gods that's hot. Don't get me started. I might never stop.

142.speaker: Karlach
142.text: You better go enjoy the party before I do something I'll regret. I like you unburnt, after all.
142.context: NodeContext: Trying to avoid jumping the player's bones

87.speaker: Karlach
87.context: NodeContext: She's saying goodbye, but she wants you to stay. Horny.

135.speaker: Player
135.text: I suppose so. But sometimes I feel like I'm stuck in the past.

140.speaker: Karlach
140.text: Don't look too far back. We only just met.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: That's well and good, but beware. Paragons don't last long on the open road.

4.speaker: Karlach
4.text: I bet you could make me last as long as you wanted.

46.speaker: Karlach
46.text: Haha! I really know how to lay it on thick, don't I? Ah well. What can I say? I'm excited to be alive. And excited about what's to come.

30.speaker: Player
30.text: 'Good' gets boring fast. I say do what suits you any time, anywhere.

65.speaker: Karlach
65.text: Really now? Cause I think you suit me perfectly.

12.speaker: Karlach
12.text: Speaking of, I hate to butt in, but I've seen the way you and Lae'zel have been looking at each other.

120.speaker: Karlach
120.text: I like her, and I bet she's a wildcat after midnight, but I'm just not sure I trust her yet. Mind yourself, all right?

93.speaker: Karlach
93.text: But hey. At least some of us are getting a little action.

77.speaker: Karlach
77.text: Speaking of possibilities, what's this I've been hearing about you and Astarion?

40.speaker: Karlach
40.text: Don't get me wrong, I'd ride him to the Feywild and back if I had the chance, but I wouldn't let my guard down around him.

89.speaker: Karlach
89.text: Good to see the two of you getting along, anyway. At least one of us is getting a little action.

44.speaker: Karlach
44.text: Though... you know. If you wanted to meet up later, maybe we could... meet up. Later.

130.speaker: Player
130.text: You know there's someone else, Karlach.

91.speaker: Karlach
91.text: I know. But you only live once, and if you never throw your dart, you'll never hit the bull's eye.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: You really are something, aren't you.

129.speaker: Karlach
129.text: Not if I enjoy you first.

92.speaker: Player
92.text: It isn't hard. And I really like you. I was wrong to go for someone else.

6.speaker: Karlach
6.text: I don't think your little friend would let me hear the end of it if I accepted. No matter how much I wanted to.

56.speaker: Karlach
56.text: And I... I really want to. Ugh. This is bad. But I want to be bad with you.
56.context: NodeContext: She's about to screw over another party member but doesn't care cause she wants to hook up with the player

50.speaker: Karlach
50.text: Enjoy yourself tonight. You've earned it.

34.speaker: Karlach
34.text: Oh god. You know I want that more than fucking anything.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames start to blazeNodeContext: She winces and breathes in sharply. Bad case of the fanny flutters, slight pain due to bursting into flame

115.speaker: Karlach
115.text: Oh god. You know I want that more than fucking anything.
115.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flames start to blazeNodeContext: She winces and breathes in sharply. Bad case of the fanny flutters, slight pain due to bursting into flame

0.speaker: Karlach
0.text: I'll come find you when the others have gone to bed. Wait up for me, all right?
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: She could even turn away as though to leave and do the 'yes' to herself as she's walking away, in the form of a little jump. Up to ye.NodeContext: To herself, as though the player can't see her. Excited cause she scored a date with the player. 'Chaching' type motion with her arm.

36.speaker: Karlach
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: She could even turn away as though to leave and do the 'yes' to herself as she's walking away, in the form of a little jump. Up to ye.NodeContext: To herself, as though the player can't see her. Excited cause she scored a date with the player. 'Chaching' type motion with her arm.

41.speaker: Karlach
41.context: CinematicNodeContext: She could even turn away as though to leave and do the 'yes' to herself as she's walking away, in the form of a little jump. Up to ye.NodeContext: To herself, as though the player can't see her. Excited cause she scored a date with the player. 'Chaching' type motion with her arm.

15.speaker: Karlach
15.text: But there's something I think you should know.
15.context:
CinematicNodeContext: "Hear that?"
She thumps her left chest with right hand, like pounding a car hood. Something mechanic clangs within.
(etc.)

123.speaker: Karlach
123.text: Hear that? Infernal engine for a heart. Lets me burn as hot as the Hells. Seems to be running in overdrive since I left Avernus.
123.context:
CinematicNodeContext: "Hear that?"
She thumps her left chest with right hand, like pounding a car hood. Something mechanic clangs within.
(etc.)

52.speaker: Karlach
52.text: It also means if I'm heated at all - excited, nervous, scared - I'm way too hot to touch.

25.speaker: Karlach
25.text: Won't be seeing my mechanic any time soon, so I'm afraid I just can't get too close.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: How the hells did you get an infernal engine for a heart?

84.speaker: Karlach
84.text: High pain tolerance. And a dynamic duo of truly shitty bosses.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: You have a mechanic for your heart?

47.speaker: Karlach
47.text: Wild, right? And believe it or not, I'm one of Zariel's least-mutilated pets.

138.speaker: Player
138.text: What does the engine allow you to do?

97.speaker: Karlach
97.text: Burn, baby. As hot as I can tolerate. Makes me a beast in battle. Hardly remember what I was like before it.

121.speaker: Player
121.text: I met someone who might be able to help - a smith who worked in the Hells for a time.

14.speaker: Karlach
14.text: Well now! Maybe I could make his acquaintance? A tightened screw or two might let me keep a little calmer.

45.speaker: Karlach
45.text: Maybe even manage a pat or bump without burning someone to death. It's been a long time.

53.speaker: Karlach
53.text: But let's not get into tragic backstories now. It's such a beautiful night.

102.speaker: Player
102.text: I still want to spend time with you - just the two of us.

117.speaker: Player
117.text: What'll happen if you don't get tuned up?

24.speaker: Karlach
24.text: Who knows! Maybe I can run like this indefinitely. But... maybe not.

79.speaker: Karlach
79.text: You. Me. Friends. Got it? Good.

114.speaker: Player
114.context: NodeContext: She's being playful here, but is wounded by the player's actions. Tone is light but emotion is real.

54.speaker: Karlach
54.text: Don't worry. I will. And I've got a good arm, you know.

141.speaker: Player
141.text: I appreciate that. But I'm afraid it's a miss this time.
141.context: NodeContext: She's being playful here, but is wounded by the player's actions. Tone is light but emotion is real.

21.speaker: Karlach
21.text: Ach. That is agonising! But I get it. I guess.
21.context: NodeContext: She's being playful here, but is wounded by the player's actions. Tone is light but emotion is real.

126.speaker: Karlach
126.text: Well look, soldier, I won't always be too hot for words and deeds. You may regret to find that I happen to be very touch-worthy, underneath the searing, lethal flames.
126.context: NodeContext: She's keeping the mood light again, but she means every word

73.speaker: Karlach
73.text: Enjoy the party. And enjoy so-and-so too, while you're at it. For now.

103.speaker: Karlach
103.text: I know I was a little hopeless when we - you know - before. I want you to be happy. And I want you to be with someone you can actually be with.
103.context: NodeContext: Playing it cool, very cool, but underneath it she's supressing her sadness at being rejected

57.speaker: Player
57.text: I want to be with you. Everything else is just a distraction.
57.context: NodeContext: Playing it cool, very cool, but underneath it she's supressing her sadness at being rejected

55.speaker: Karlach
55.text: I don't know if you mean that. But I hope you do.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: 'Hopeless'? I can't stop thinking about it - and you.
13.context: NodeContext: Playing it cool, very cool, but underneath it she's supressing her sadness at being rejected

101.speaker: Karlach
101.text: Really? I thought - because of you and you know... I don't know, I thought maybe you just wanted to be with someone you could actually be with.

133.speaker: Karlach
133.text: I'd understand. I mean, I do understand. I'm not possessive. And at the end of the day, I want you to do what you want to do.

107.speaker: Karlach
107.text: I just want that to be me. Somehow. Some day.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: Thank you. I know it can't be easy.
83.context: NodeContext: Playing it cool, very cool, but underneath it she's supressing her sadness at being rejected

70.speaker: Karlach
70.text: I can handle it. After all, life was made to be lived. And that's exactly what you're doing.
70.context: NodeContext: Playing it cool, very cool, but underneath it she's supressing her sadness at being rejected

10.speaker: Karlach
10.text: Enjoy yourself, soldier. You deserve it.

118.speaker: Karlach
118.text: Take you and Gale, for instance. Don't think I haven't noticed the sparks flying.
118.context: NodeContext: Admiration in her voice. She's very fond of Wyll

74.speaker: Karlach
74.text: He's a good egg. A little scholarly for my tastes, but I'm sure you could crack his spine like a new book.

49.speaker: Karlach
49.text: Speaking of, from where I'm standing it looks like you and Shadowheart are getting more... familiar.
49.context: NodeContext: Admiration in her voice. She's very fond of Wyll

95.speaker: Karlach
95.text: She's a funny one. All pointy and secretive, but it seems like there's someone very sweet beneath it all, you know?

128.speaker: Karlach
128.text: Then we have you and Wyll, the ultimate incarnation of all things good in the world. There's something between you two, isn't there?
128.context: NodeContext: Admiration in her voice. She's very fond of Wyll

125.speaker: Karlach
125.text: He's a good one. The best, maybe. When I think about what he sacrificed for me... Give him something to smile about, all right?

113.speaker: Karlach
113.context: NodeContext: Being a little funny, using a weird word for alcohol

112.speaker: Karlach
112.text: Fuck yes! I'm celebrating my freedom. And our friendship. And these folks' bright future besides.

75.speaker: Karlach
75.text: All I need now is a fire-retardant lover to get lost in 'til sunrise.

136.speaker: Karlach
136.text: Speaking of which... there's something I wanted to tell you.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: How the hells did you get an infernal engine for a heart?

104.speaker: Player
104.text: You have a mechanic for your heart?

127.speaker: Player
127.text: What does the engine allow you to do?

69.speaker: Player
69.text: I met someone who might be able to help - a smith who worked in the Hells for a time.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: Did you have parties like this in Avernus?

72.speaker: Karlach
72.text: Not so much. You spend the whole time avoiding swords and schemes. Plus people just get nastier as the night wears on.

66.speaker: Karlach
66.text: I tried to make friends at first. Learned my lesson fast. Better to keep to yourself in Hell.

96.speaker: Player
96.text: I think I've drummed up the courage to tell you how much I like you.

60.speaker: Karlach
60.text: Ah, come on. I know I'm not really who you're interested in. And anyway, even if I were, you couldn't touch me without getting burnt to a crisp.

59.speaker: Karlach
59.text: I like you too. A lot. I'm sure you know that by now.

16.text: I like you too. A lot. I'm sure you know that by now.

64.speaker: Karlach
64.text: I like you too. A lot. I'm sure you know that by now.

11.speaker: Karlach
11.text: Ah, c'mon, let's not spoil an effective thing. You point, I rage, we win. Doesn't need to be more complicated than that.

32.speaker: Karlach
32.text: Can't wait for bed time. See you soon.
32.context: NodeContext: Neutral. Could be sarcastic, could be serious

80.speaker: Karlach
80.text: Cheers to you, soldier. And to me, if I do say so myself.
80.context: NodeContext: Neutral. Could be sarcastic, could be serious

116.speaker: Karlach
116.context: NodeContext: Neutral. Could be sarcastic, could be serious
